coreAttributes.name: hoodie
coreAttributes.description: A long-sleeved pullover shirt, fashioned out of thick cotton and complete with a hood.

replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the hoodie's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it on [npc2.herHim].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the hoodie's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it on [npc2.herHim].

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] hoodie back down to cover [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] hoodie back down to cover [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] hoodie back down to cover [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] hoodie up to just below [npc.her] chin, letting the elastic rim hold it in place.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] hoodie up to just below [npc2.her] chin, letting the elastic rim hold it in place.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] hoodie up to just below [npc2.her] chin, letting the elastic rim hold it in place.
